Content: Police Special Task Force has raided a house at Moragahahena, Millewa area which has been used as a Registrarâ€™s Office to issue fake certificates. They have arrested a suspect who is a resident of Millewa area. Police have found 25 marriage certificates, 35 death certificates and 10 rubber stamps used to prepare the fake certificates. The suspect is reported to have worked as an Office Assistant at the Finance Ministry. The suspect was handed over to Moragahahena Police by the STF.
